channel.title: ClanChat RedStone Problem
channel.description: Hi everyone. I have a slight problem with my client. When I click on my Clanchat tab, it shows the Ignore List RedStone over top of the Ignore list instead of showing the clanchat redstone wen i click on the clanchat tab. Please Help.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 30, 2009, 10:02:11 am[/size][hr]BUMP: May someone answer this?

item.title: ClanChat RedStone Problem

Hi everyone. I have a slight problem with my client. When I click on my Clanchat tab, it shows the Ignore List RedStone over top of the Ignore list instead of showing the clanchat redstone wen i click on the clanchat tab.
